name: Bolster Bar Stool - Canvas
description:
Elevate your space with the Bolster Bar Stool Canvas – a perfect blend of 1970's aesthetic and modern design. The unique bar stool will seamlessly integrate into contemporary kitchens or make for a sophisticated addition to a bar, this stool promises not only style but also comfort.
The curved brushed steel frame features sleek lines and a polished finish to create an eye-catching focal point, making a bold statement in your space. The sturdy construction ensures durability, promising a lasting investment.
The frame is complimented by the canvas upholstered cushioned seat and bolster back cushion. The canvas fabric, woven with precision, not only provides a visually appealing texture but also adds a tactile dimension to the piece. The ideal place to perch.
